about_the_game:
ToledoVR is a action/strategy game for the HTC Vive.

Play as a god from the top and fight as a hero on the ground.

The demo has no local multiplayer and you cannot level up.

Playable both in VR and on the PC simultaneously (local multiplayer).

Map 1:


  • Gametype: MOBA (Use waves of units to destroy towers and finally the enemy)
  • Gamemodes: Singleplayer (vs AI), local multiplayer (1vs1)

Map 2:


  • Gametype: RTS (Erect buildings and command units in real time)
  • Gamemodes: Singleplayer (vs AI), local multiplayer (1vs1), local coop (survival mode)

Play as a god from the top and fight as a hero on the ground.

The demo has no local multiplayer and you cannot level up.

Playable both in VR and on the PC simultaneously (local multiplayer).

Map 2:

name: ToledoVR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti / AMD 5850
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: ToledoVR is a action/strategy game for the HTC Vive. Play as a god from the top and fight as a hero on the ground. Playable both in VR and on the PC simultaneously (local multiplayer).
